title_add_domain_button.message: Add current site's domain to list (NICE_DOMAIN).

title_add_url_button.message: Add current site's complete URL to list (NICE_URL).

title_copy_button.message: Copy color or mode setting from one site to other.

lbl_select_copy_from.message: Select the color or mode you want to copy.

lbl_select_copy_to.message: Now select the colors/modes where you want to apply the copy.

lbl_enable_everywhere_info.message: If you enable these settings they will be applied on every website where you have not defined any other settings..

title_enable_never.message: Never apply any color or mode on this site.

title_enable_everywhere.message: Apply only general colors or modes (defined at the very top) on this site.

title_enable_custom.message: Apply custom colors or modes, defined to the right, on this site.

lbl_add_site_info.message: Click on the buttons located in the upper part, represented with a plus symbol (+), to add current site's domain (SITE_DOMAIN) or complete URL (SITE_URL) to the custom sites list.

lbl_add_site_info_only_domain.message: Click on the button located in the upper part, represented with a plus symbol (+), to add current site's domain (SITE_DOMAIN) to the custom sites list.

lbl_add_site_info_chrome.message: This extension is not able to customize Chrome pages (settings, extensions, new tab, etc.).

title_input_random.message: New random color every time the site loads.

title_delete_site.message: Delete this site's settings and stop applying colors or modes on it.

lbl_popup_color_selector_choose.message: Choose a color or a mode for

lbl_delete_confirmation_message.message: Are you sure you want to delete this site's settings? Original colors will be shown again.

title_save_random.message: Save current random color as selected color.
